attributes.action: Withdraw all financial support of refugees & asylum seekers for initial 5yrs.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Any person/persons wanting to relocate to Britain,must financially support themselves during there stay in the Country.
(for a minimum of 5years)

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
